title: Deployment Options - Netskope Knowledge Portal
content: Netskope deployment options support any use case, from an API only deployment mode to several real-time options. Top Use Cases at a Glance Discover SaaS, IaaS, and web use details and assess risk. Secure your managed cloud services such as Office 365, G Suite, Box, and AWS. Safely enable unmanaged, business-led cloud services instead of being forced to block them. Govern cloud and web use for users on-premises, mobile, and remote. Guard sensitive data with award-winning DLP. Stop elusive cloud threats and malware both. Product Deployments Using patented technology called Netskope Cloud XDâ„¢, the Netskope Security Cloud eliminates blind spots by going deeper than any other security provider to quickly target and control activities across thousands of cloud (SaaS and IaaS) services and millions of websites. With full control from one cloud, our customers benefit from 360-degree data protection that guards data everywhere and advanced threat protection that stops elusive attacks. Get complete visibility of all SaaS, IaaS, and web traffic, including from sync clients, mobile apps and TLS-encrypted traffic. Deploy 100% in the cloud, with an on-premises appliance, or a hybrid option.
